item.description: Doubler: A crypto asset appreciation tool based on the martingale strategy ðŸ“šWhat is Doubler? Doubler is a very creative and forward-looking DEFI tool that forms a mutually beneficial relationship between users through crowdfunding and incentives, allowing users to share risks and rewards, and increase user confidence in participating in crypto asset investment. If you hold BTC but don’t want to sell it, but worry about the losses caused by the decline, just join Doubler.
